//Day seconds cycles Day Day 1 Day 10 Day 11 Day 12 Day 13 Day 14 Day 15 Day 16 Day 17 Day 18 Day 19 Day 2 Day 20 Day 21 Day 22 Day 23 Day 24 Day 25 Day 26 Day 27 Day 28 Day 29 Day 3 Day 30 Day 4 Day 6 Day 7 Day 8 Day 9 //Exercise
super cobra stretch pilates roll over hopping with one leg cat cow stretch forward spine stretch for wheat wrap * 6 times for wheat wrap * 7 times rope jumping plank triangle pose Peanut butter pelvic shift spot jumping Standard Diet standing vertical stretch wall stretch hands on the head bow down hanging exercise two straight legs up table top downward facing dog pose dry land swim
Initially, be in tabletop position. Inhale, move your belly towards the floor, lift your chin up in the cow pose. Now, exhale by moving your back and belly upwards towards the ceiling in the cat pose. Repeat it. Lie down with your face, towards the ground and hands on your side. Now, with the support of your hands, lift the body and move to the table top position. Exhale and lift your hip towards the sky. Lie down with your face, towards the ground and hands stretched forward. Lift your right arm and left leg above the ground. Be in this position. Repeat the same on the other side. Sit down on the floor with your legs forward . Now stretch your arms forward. Then return back to the initial position. Keep your hands on the back of your head. Now bend forward. Then return back to the initial position. Initially, hang on a pole. Now raise both your legs. Then return back to the initial position. Initially rest on one leg. Then hop as high as you can, around 10 to 15 times. Repeat it on the other side. Lie on your back with your legs tilted and arms by the side. Now raise your hips and be in this position for some time. Then lower your hips. Lie on your back with your arms by the side. Now raise your legs together at 90 degree angle. Then exhale, lower your body to a horizontal position and further. Caution : While lowering your body, do not try to stretch beyond your limits. If you feel any discomfort or pain, immediately consult a doctor. Be on your toes and forearms with your body straight. Stay in this position for as long as possible. Rope jumping is skipping. For this you need a skipping rope. Do it in sets of 15 as a beginner. Gradually increase the count. Sit with your legs stretched forward. Now raise your legs and stretch your body with your arms forward, then touch the knee and if possible the shin and toe. Initially, stand on your feet. Now raise your arms straight and upwards, then start jumping. Repeat it for 2 minutes. Stand with your feet wider than your hips. Inhale, stretch your arms over your head and lock your hands. Now inhale and lean towards the left, then exhale and return back to the initial position. Repeat the same on the other side. Initially, keep your arms perpendicular to the ground and your spine arched. Bend your hips and bring the body to a V shaped position. Be in this position for sometime and then return back to the initial position. Sit with your legs stretched forward with hands on the side and palms touching the ground. Now lift your body by pressing the arms and feet on the ground to make a table like shape. Stay in this position for about 15 seconds and then return back to the initial position. Repeat it. Stretch your legs, a little more than the shoulder width. Turn your right toe to the side. Inhale and raise your arms to the side. Exhale and stretch your right hand to touch the shin by tilting your hip, the left hand should be pointing towards the sky. Take two to three long, slow breaths through your nose. Inhale and come back to the initial position. Repeat the same on the other side. Lie on your back with your hands by the side. Raise your legs above the ground at 90 degree. Now with the support of your forearms, lift your body and legs further up towards the ceiling, with the hands placed at the back for support. Lean against a wall with your hands. Now stretch with your left leg, a feet away from the wall and your right leg, a feet away from your left leg. Repeat on the other side.
